author: kfogel
msg: Fix bug whereby ra_dav could silently ignore an error during log
(svn_ra_dav__get_log): Initialize log baton error to null, then
check it after the parse and return it if non-null.

author: striker
msg: Bump the Apache requirement to 2.0.40 or greater, instead of 2.0.39.

author: striker
msg: Update all references to Apache 2.0.36 to 2.0.39.

author: kfogel
msg: In revisions 2600 and 2598, the Subversion repository has UTF-8 data
that cannot be converted to ISO-8859-1, among others.  (The data is
Branko Čibej's full name, which I include here just to make this
(log_message_receiver): Don't error if encounter unconvertible data,
just print a placeholder and move on.
